title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Rotterdam - city and harbor
description:
In this  video we will have a look at 2 community addons which are focusing on Rotterdam in the Netherlands. Once of the addons is focused on the harbor part while the other one is more focused on the city center. When you want to use these addons yourself also keep in mind they require several helper libraries also which makes the required diskspace over 10GB in total.

0:00 intro
0:10 Rotterdam Maasvlakte
3:24 Refineries
4:00 Rotterdam city center
6:15 Fly over de Maas at low altitude
8:45 flight back to Rotterdam Botlek/Maasvlakte

If you also want to give the sceneries a try you can download it from the site below:

Harbor:
https://flightsim.to/file/36155/harbour-of-rotterdam

City:
https://flightsim.to/file/3670/rotterdam-city

Vessels:
https://nl.flightsim.to/file/9529/global-ai-ship-traffic-msfs-v1

Barcelona port and water cleanup:
https://flightsim.to/file/31493/barcelona-port-and-water-clean-up-barcelona-spain

VFR region 1:
https://flightsim.to/file/2605/we-love-vfr-region-1

San Pedro Bay port facilities:
https://flightsim.to/file/5846/san-pedro-bay-port-facilities-los-angeles-long-beach-ca-usa
